Combocheck.NAME: Combo System
Combocheck.FLAVOR: More combo, less damage every hit, isn't that comon sense in fighting games?
DESCRIPTIONS: Combo plus 1 every time you play an attack card in one turn. Add 1 weapon switch at hand every 10 stack, all attack deals 1 less damage. Combo resets when you play a weapon card different from the weapon you are equipping.
